subject: [Radiance-general] HDR Photos with evalglar
body:
to check which version of evalglare you have, type evalglare -v in the terminal.

I upgraded a few weeks ago to version 1.11 release 17.01.2013, which I believe is the most current.
http://www.ise.fraunhofer.de/en/areas-of-business-and-market-areas/applied-optics-and-functional-surfaces/lighting-technology/lighting-simulations/radiance//radiance


MM
